polished_script:
HOOK: Your tenth video will destroy someone else's polished first one. [ON-SCREEN: Video #10 > Polished Video #1]

BRAND INTRO: "This is D.J. Paris with Keeping It Real Podcast, and this is your agent tip of the day."

SETUP: You tried video twice, maybe three times. Felt awkward, got crickets, quit. You're telling yourself you're "just not a video person." Kim Rittberg â€” former Netflix marketer who produced TV for a decade â€” now trains agents exactly like you. [ON-SCREEN: Kim Rittberg - Netflix Marketer]
[15-SEC RE-HOOK]: But here's what she discovered about why agents really quit at video three.

INSIGHT: Kim showed me one agent's progression. Video one: "Um, so... homes are selling fast." Stiff. Generic. Video five: still awkward, but she mentioned the new traffic pattern on Maple killing showings. [ON-SCREEN: Video 1 vs Video 5] Video twelve: she's walking buyers through why that traffic creates opportunity three blocks over. Same person. Twelve reps. Kim calls it MSR â€” Mindset, Skill set, Repetition. [ON-SCREEN: MSR Formula] Here's what really changed: Video one, she's thinking "I should do this." Video twelve: "I'm the only agent who'll explain this." That shift from obligation to authority â€” that's the mindset unlock.

REFRAME: You're not wrong about your current video skills. You're wrong about your starting point. Stop starting with "I should make videos." Start with "Only I know this about my market." The reps and skills follow automatically.

CTA: "What's one thing only you know about your market this week â€” drop it below?"

CLOSE: "See you next time."

---

CAPTION: Stop starting with "I should." Start with "Only I know this." The video skills follow automatically. ðŸŽ¥
HASHTAGS: #RealEstateVideo #AgentTips #VideoMarketing #RealEstateSuccess #PropertyExpert
SHAREABLE_MOMENT: "Video one: 'I should do this.' Video twelve: 'I'm the only agent who'll explain this.'"
PERFORMANCE_NOTES: [Emphasize "tenth" and "polished first" in hook with hand gestures. Slow down on the MSR breakdown. Direct eye contact during "only I know this" moment.]

_metadata.rewrite_changelog: Replaced abstract MSR explanation with concrete agent progression story. Sharpened hook to focus on the '10 videos' insight. Completely rewrote CTA to give two specific actions with exact timing: write the sentence NOW, film it tomorrow at 9am. Changed 'homework' language to immediate directive.
_metadata.judge_note: The MSR framework gets buried in explanationâ€”show one real agent's before/after mindset shift instead of defining all three steps abstractly.
